packages.name: First steps
packages.description: A hello world package for the first steps with TRY.js containing a very simple environment setup, a synchronious robot program and a test suite.
packages.author: Stephan Ahlf

packages.name: Save the flowers
packages.description: This demo shows a simple mission with a more advanced test suite.
packages.author: Stephan Ahlf

packages.name: Challenge: Mission impossible
packages.description: Find a way out and bring the robot into his energy station.
packages.author: Stephan Ahlf
